Walks hand in hand with Phillip, showing calmness and connection.
Smiles during tense confrontation, indicating a relaxed or reassuring demeanor.
Mentions Phillip 'got rid of the evidence', implying involvement in crime, potentially deceptive.
Continues to walk calmly with Phillip while armed agents approach, smiles and demonstrates awareness of the situation by acknowledging he is unarmed and that the boy disposed of the gun.
Does not immediately comply with multiple commands from armed agents to stop and put hands up, potentially risking escalation.
Wants to talk to the boy and then handle business quickly, offers something to the boy.
Reaches slowly and painfully for his back pocket and smiles while retrieving the postcard instead of a weapon.
Despite being in danger, attempts a sincere, peaceful gesture towards Phillip.
Attempts to negotiate calmly with Red, trying to de-escalate the situation by proposing to talk and handle business quickly.
Reaches into his pocket slowly and smiles, which causes concern and misunderstanding among others who think he is going for a weapon.
